Package com.PDLB.PPE.API.repository

Interface ContractEnergyTypeRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ContractEnergyType,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ContractEnergyType,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<ContractEnergyType,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<ContractEnergyType,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ContractEnergyType,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ContractEnergyType>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ContractEnergyType,Integer>
@Repository public interface ContractEnergyTypeRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ContractEnergyType,Integer>
This interface represents the energy type of contract repository, which allows us to perform CRUD operations on energy type of contract entities in the database.

  • Method Details

    • createContractEnergyType

      @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_createContractEnergyType(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4)", nativeQuery=true) int createContractEnergyType(float dayPrice, float nightPrice, String contract, int energyTypeId)
      Creates a contract energy type in the database.
      Parameters:
      dayPrice - The price during the day.
      nightPrice - The price during the night.
      contract - The contract associated with the energy type.
      energyTypeId - The ID of the energy type.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created contract energy type.

    • getAllContractEnergyTypes

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getAllContractEnergyTypes", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<ContractEnergyType> getAllContractEnergyTypes()
      Retrieves all contract energy types from the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of ContractEnergyType objects representing all contract energy types.

    • getContractEnergyTypeById

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getContractEnergyTypeById(?1)", nativeQuery=true) ContractEnergyType getContractEnergyTypeById(int id)
      Retrieves a contract energy type from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract energy type to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The ContractEnergyType object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getContractEnergyTypeByContractId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getContractEnergyTypeByContractId(?1)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<ContractEnergyType> getContractEnergyTypeByContractId(String contractId)
      Retrieves contract energy types associated with a specific contract from the database.
      Parameters:
      contractId - The ID of the contract.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of ContractEnergyType objects associated with the specified contract.

    • updateContractEnergyType

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_updateContractEnergyType(?1, ?2, ?3)", nativeQuery=true) void updateContractEnergyType(int id, float dayPrice, float nightPrice)
      Updates the details of a contract energy type in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract energy type to update.
      dayPrice - The updated price during the day.
      nightPrice - The updated price during the night.

    • deleteContractEnergyTypeById

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_deleteContractEnergyTypeById(?1)", nativeQuery=true) void deleteContractEnergyTypeById(int id)
      Deletes a contract energy type from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract energy type to delete.
